# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will bring significant benefits to you. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a remarkable opportunity to acquire a product that is worth $10000, at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
